title: I need 3 RP
body:
Hi Riot, 
I was wondering if it were possible to get 3 RP, I'm currently at 972 and need 3 more to be able to buy a 975 skin. I'd really appreciate it if I could get just 3 RP added to my account. Thank you!

replies.body:
Hey Optimus, for this type of request, I recommend reaching out in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) We may be able to help you out, but this is something we can better assist within a ticket.

Let me know if you have any questions.
